name: unique-browser-tab-id
description: Get a unique, persistent id for every browser tab

scripts.build-tsc: rm dist/* && npm run tsc -- --declaration true --outDir dist
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && TAG=`git tag --list --contains=@` && npm run build && git add dist -f && git commit --amend -m "Bump version to $TAG" && git tag -f $TAG
scripts.test-the-build-interactively: npm run build && npx serve test/dist
